title: Renovated 1 Bed/1 Bath with a Courtyard View!!!
posting_body: We have available spacious 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartments with full kitchens, separate dining areas, large living rooms, and private balconies all facing either our beautifully landscaped courtyard or our lovely pool!
Full kitchen with open separate dining area
Large living room with open layout
Big balcony with gorgeous view of landscaped courtyard or pool
Assigned parking for one car included &; an additional space for $50 monthly
We would love to show you our beautiful 10-acre property located in West San Jose on Payne Avenue between Winchester and near San Tomas Expressway.

This gorgeously landscaped community is conveniently located extremely close to some of the major south bay shopping centers like Valley Fair Mall & Santana Row, many restaurants & theaters, multiple supermarkets, and the Los Gatos Creek Trail.
The nearby freeways are I-280, I-880, HW-17, as well the San Tomas and Lawrence Expressways.
We are also only 10-15 minutes from Downtown Campbell, Downtown San Jose, Midtown San Jose, Los Gatos, Santa Clara, Sunnyvale, Cupertino and Willow Glen.
Utilities: All-inclusive except for PG&E and your choice of Phone/Internet/Cable provider
Requirements: Total monthly household income must be 3X the rent
$500 move in deposit only with a 2-cat maximum!
Our onsite team is available and happy to assist you!
Schedule a tour with us today by calling
*Pictures of apartment are similar but may not be of the exact unit.
